sentence: Mr. LATIMER. Mr. Speaker, in a world where local news services-- newspapers and radio stations--are disappearing on a frightening level,  it is important to recognize and salute those organizations that are  continuing to provide information…

…Desmond: Washington Post.

Byrne, Maria: New York Times; Cameron, Christopher: New       York Times; Capaccio, Anthony: Bloomberg News; Capdepon       Sendra, Esteban: EFE News Services; Caplan, Abby: Argus       Media; Cappelletti, Joseph: Associated Press; Capps, Kriston:       Bloomberg News; Caralle, Katelyn: DailyMail.com; Carey,       Dominic: Bloomberg…

…Allen, Jonathan: NBC NEWS; Allen, Lisa: GRAY TELEVISION;       Allen, Mina: CNN; Allen, Sabina: ABC NEWS; Allen, Virginia:       THE DAILY SIGNAL; Allilou, Azouz: ASHARQ NEWS SERVICES;       Allison, Tiye: CBN NEWS; Almanza, Armando: VENTANA       PRODUCTIONS; Alonso, Nahiara: AGENCE FRANCE PRESSE (AFP-TV);       Alrawashdeh, Imad: ALARABY TV; Alrawi,…
